overview: A group of geeky teens in backwoods New Hampshire start a punk band as a way to make sense of their high school angst, raging hormones, and raucous personalities. When they accidentally attract a cult following and become local town legends, they struggle to balance their wayward persona with the looming pressures of adulthood.
tagline: The rise and fall of the Goddamn Tooney Lunes, the best band you've never heard of
title: The Goddamn Tooney Lunes
